verses.verse: In the <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of our <S%H1546>captivity,<s%> in the <S%H7218>beginning<s%> of the <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> in the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H5221>struck,<s%> in the <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was on <S%H935>me,<s%> and he brought me there.

In the <S%H4759>visions<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> he me into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H5117>set<s%> me down on a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> whereon was as it were the <S%H4011>frame<s%> of a <S%H5892>city<s%> on the <S%H5045>south.<s%>

He <S%H935>brought<s%> me <S%H376>there;<s%> and, behold, there was a man, whose <S%H4758>appearance<s%> was like the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H5178>brass,<s%> with a <S%H6616>line<s%> of <S%H6593>flax<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and a <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed;<s%> and he <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate.<s%>

The <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H1121>me,<s%> Son of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> with your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> with your <S%H241>ears,<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> on all that I shall <S%H7200>show<s%> <S%H4616>you;<s%> for, to the intent that I may <S%H7200>show<s%> them to <S%H935>you,<s%> you are brought <S%H5046>here:<s%> declare all that you <S%H7200>see<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H2346>Behold,<s%> a wall on the <S%H2351>outside<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> all <S%H5439>around,<s%> and in the <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%> a <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H520>long,<s%> of a cubit and a <S%H2948>handbreadth<s%> <S%H4058>each:<s%> so he measured the <S%H2948>thickness<s%> of the <S%H1146>building,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed;<s%> and the <S%H6967>height,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed.<s%>

Then <S%H935>came<s%> he to the <S%H8179>gate<s%> which <S%H6440>looks<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east,<s%> and went <S%H5927>up<s%> its <S%H4609>steps:<s%> and he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H5592>threshold<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> <S%H7341>broad;<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H5592>threshold,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> <S%H7341>broad.<s%>

Every <S%H8372>lodge<s%> was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> <S%H753>long,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> <S%H7341>broad;<s%> and the space between the <S%H8372>lodges<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and the <S%H5592>threshold<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H1004>toward<s%> the house was <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>reed.<s%>
He <S%H4058>measured<s%> also the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H1004>toward<s%> the <S%H259>house,<s%> one <S%H7070>reed.<s%>

Then <S%H4058>measured<s%> he the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and its <S%H352>posts,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> was toward the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

The <S%H8372>lodges<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H1870>eastward<s%> were <S%H7969>three<s%> on this <S%H6311>side,<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> on that <S%H6311>side;<s%> they <S%H7969>three<s%> were of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4060>measure:<s%> and the <S%H352>posts<s%> had <S%H259>one<s%> measure on this side and on that <S%H4060>side.<s%>

He <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H6607>opening<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and the <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%>

and a <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H8372>lodges,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H520>cubit<s%> on this <S%H1366>side,<s%> and a border, one <S%H520>cubit<s%> on that <S%H8372>side;<s%> and the lodges, <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> on this <S%H8337>side,<s%> and six cubits on that <S%H520>side.<s%>

He <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> from the <S%H1406>roof<s%> of the one <S%H8372>lodge<s%> to the <S%H1406>roof<s%> of the <S%H7341>other,<s%> a breadth of <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> <S%H6607>door<s%> against <S%H6607>door.<s%>
He <S%H6213>made<s%> also <S%H352>posts,<s%> <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and the <S%H2691>court<s%> reached to the <S%H352>posts,<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H8179>gate.<s%>

From the <S%H6440>forefront<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> at the <S%H2978>entrance<s%> to the <S%H6440>forefront<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> were <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

There were <S%H331>closed<s%> <S%H2474>windows<s%> to the <S%H8372>lodges,<s%> and to their <S%H352>posts<s%> <S%H6441>within<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> all <S%H5439>around,<s%> and likewise to the <S%H361>arches;<s%> and <S%H2474>windows<s%> were <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H6441>inward;<s%> and on each <S%H352>post<s%> were palm <S%H8561>trees.<s%>

Then <S%H935>brought<s%> he me into the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court;<s%> and <S%H3957>behold,<s%> there were rooms and a <S%H7531>pavement,<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> for the <S%H2691>court<s%> all <S%H5439>around:<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H3957>rooms<s%> were on the <S%H7531>pavement.<s%>

The <S%H7531>pavement<s%> was by the <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates,<s%> <S%H5980>answerable<s%> to the <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates,<s%> even the <S%H8481>lower<s%> <S%H7531>pavement.<s%>

Then he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> from the <S%H6440>forefront<s%> of the <S%H8481>lower<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> to the <S%H6440>forefront<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H2351>outside,<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> both on the <S%H6921>east<s%> and on the <S%H6828>north.<s%>

The <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> whose <S%H6440>prospect<s%> is <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north,<s%> he <S%H4058>measured<s%> its <S%H753>length<s%> and its <S%H7341>breadth.<s%>

The <S%H8372>lodges<s%> of it were <S%H7969>three<s%> on this side and <S%H7969>three<s%> on that <S%H352>side;<s%> and its posts and its <S%H361>arches<s%> were after the <S%H4060>measure<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H8179>gate:<s%> its <S%H753>length<s%> was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H520>twenty<s%> - five cubits.

The <S%H2474>windows<s%> of <S%H361>it,<s%> and its arches, and the palm <S%H8561>trees<s%> of <S%H4060>it,<s%> were after the measure of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> whose <S%H6440>prospect<s%> is <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east;<s%> and they went <S%H5927>up<s%> to it by <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4609>steps;<s%> and its <S%H361>arches<s%> were before <S%H6440>them.<s%>

There was a <S%H8179>gate<s%> to the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> over against the other <S%H8179>gate,<s%> both on the <S%H6828>north<s%> and on the <S%H6921>east;<s%> and he <S%H4058>measured<s%> from <S%H8179>gate<s%> to <S%H8179>gate<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

He <S%H3212>led<s%> me <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south;<s%> and <S%H8179>behold,<s%> a gate <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south:<s%> and he <S%H4058>measured<s%> its <S%H352>posts<s%> and its <S%H361>arches<s%> according to these <S%H4060>measures.<s%>

There were <S%H2474>windows<s%> in it and in its <S%H361>arches<s%> all <S%H5439>around,<s%> like those <S%H2474>windows:<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

There were <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4609>steps<s%> to go <S%H5930>up<s%> to <S%H361>it,<s%> and its arches were <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8561>them;<s%> and it had palm trees, <S%H259>one<s%> on this <S%H259>side,<s%> and another on that <S%H352>side,<s%> on its posts.

There was a <S%H8179>gate<s%> to the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south:<s%> and he <S%H4058>measured<s%> from <S%H8179>gate<s%> to <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

Then he <S%H935>brought<s%> me to the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> by the <S%H1864>south<s%> <S%H8179>gate:<s%> and he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H1864>south<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> according to these <S%H4060>measures;<s%>

and its <S%H8372>lodges,<s%> and its <S%H352>posts,<s%> and its <S%H361>arches,<s%> according to these <S%H4060>measures:<s%> and there were <S%H2474>windows<s%> in it and in its <S%H361>arches<s%> all <S%H5439>around;<s%> it was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long,<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad.<s%>
There were <S%H361>arches<s%> all <S%H5439>around,<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad.<s%>

The <S%H361>arches<s%> of it were toward the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court;<s%> and palm <S%H8561>trees<s%> were on its <S%H352>posts:<s%> and the <S%H4608>ascent<s%> to it had <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H4609>steps.<s%>

He <S%H935>brought<s%> me into the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east:<s%> and he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> according to these <S%H4060>measures;<s%>

and its <S%H8372>lodges,<s%> and its <S%H352>posts,<s%> and its <S%H361>arches,<s%> according to these <S%H4060>measures:<s%> and there were <S%H2474>windows<s%> therein and in its <S%H361>arches<s%> all <S%H5439>around;<s%> it was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long,<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad.<s%>

The <S%H361>arches<s%> of it were toward the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court;<s%> and palm <S%H8561>trees<s%> were on its <S%H352>posts,<s%> on this <S%H4608>side,<s%> and on that side: and the ascent to it had <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H4609>steps.<s%>
He <S%H935>brought<s%> me to the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H8179>gate:<s%> and he <S%H4058>measured<s%> it according to these <S%H4060>measures;<s%>

its <S%H8372>lodges,<s%> its <S%H352>posts,<s%> and its <S%H361>arches:<s%> and there were <S%H2474>windows<s%> therein all <S%H5439>around;<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

The <S%H352>posts<s%> of it were toward the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court;<s%> and palm <S%H8561>trees<s%> were on its <S%H352>posts,<s%> on this <S%H4608>side,<s%> and on that side: and the ascent to it had <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H4609>steps.<s%>
A <S%H3957>room<s%> with its <S%H6607>door<s%> was by the <S%H352>posts<s%> at the <S%H8179>gates;<s%> there they <S%H1740>washed<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

In the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> were <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7979>tables<s%> on this <S%H7979>side,<s%> and two tables on that <S%H7819>side,<s%> to kill thereon the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> and the trespass <S%H817>offering.<s%>

On the one <S%H3802>side<s%> <S%H2351>outside,<s%> as one goes <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H6607>entry<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north,<s%> were <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7979>tables;<s%> and on the <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H3802>side,<s%> which belonged to the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> were <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7979>tables.<s%>

<S%H702>Four<s%> <S%H7979>tables<s%> were on this <S%H702>side,<s%> and four <S%H7979>tables<s%> on that <S%H3802>side,<s%> by the side of the <S%H8179>gate;<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H7979>tables,<s%> whereupon they killed the <S%H7819>sacrifices.<s%>

There were <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7979>tables<s%> for the burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> of <S%H1496>cut<s%> <S%H68>stone,<s%> a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H753>long,<s%> and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7341>broad,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H520>cubit<s%> <S%H1363>high;<s%> whereupon they <S%H3240>laid<s%> the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> with which they <S%H7819>killed<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the <S%H2077>sacrifice.<s%>

The <S%H8240>hooks,<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H2948>handbreadth<s%> <S%H3559>long,<s%> were fastened <S%H1004>within<s%> all <S%H5439>around:<s%> and on the <S%H7979>tables<s%> was the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H7133>offering.<s%>

<S%H2351>Outside<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> were <S%H3957>rooms<s%> for the <S%H7891>singers<s%> in the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> which was at the <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H8179>gate;<s%> and their <S%H6440>prospect<s%> was <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south;<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> at the <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> having the <S%H6440>prospect<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north.<s%>

He <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H2090>me,<s%> This <S%H3957>room,<s%> whose <S%H6440>prospect<s%> is <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south,<s%> is for the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of the <S%H4931>duty<s%> of the <S%H1004>house;<s%>

and the <S%H3957>room<s%> whose <S%H6440>prospect<s%> is <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north<s%> is for the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of the <S%H4931>duty<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> these are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok,<s%> who from among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> come <S%H7131>near<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to minister to <S%H8334>him.<s%>

He <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H2691>court,<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long,<s%> and a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad,<s%> <S%H7251>foursquare;<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar<s%> was <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

Then he <S%H935>brought<s%> me to the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H4058>measured<s%> each <S%H352>post<s%> of the <S%H197>porch,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> on this <S%H2568>side,<s%> and five <S%H520>cubits<s%> on that <S%H7341>side:<s%> and the breadth of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> was <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> on this <S%H7969>side,<s%> and three cubits on that <S%H520>side.<s%>

The <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H197>porch<s%> was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H6249>eleven<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> even by the <S%H4609>steps<s%> by which they went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H5982>it:<s%> and there were pillars by the <S%H352>posts,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> on this <S%H259>side,<s%> and another on that side.
